scripts.mail-server-config: dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/__EAVFW__.__MainApp__ "Smtp:Port" "2500" &&  dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/__EAVFW__.__MainApp__ "Smtp:Host" "127.0.0.1" && dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/__EAVFW__.__MainApp__ "Smtp:EnableEmails" "true"
scripts.mail-rm: docker stop mailslurper && docker rm mailslurper
scripts.mail-recreate: npm run mail-rm && npm run mail-create
scripts.set-user-secrets: npm run mail-server-config && npm run db-connection-string
scripts.db-connection-string: dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/__EAVFW__.__MainApp__ "ConnectionStrings:ApplicationDB" "Server=127.0.0.1; Initial Catalog=__databaseName__; User ID=sa; Password=Bigs3cRet; TrustServerCertificate=true"
scripts.db-recreate: npm run db-rm && npm run db-create
scripts.db-initialize: docker exec -it __EAVFW__ /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P Bigs3cRet -Q "CREATE DATABASE __databaseName__;ALTER DATABASE __databaseName__ SET RECOVERY SIMPLE;"
scripts.db-run-script: docker exec -i __EAVFW__ /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -s localhost -U sa -P Bigs3cRet -d __databaseName__ -I -i /opt/dbinit/init.sql -i /opt/dbinit/init-systemadmin.sql -v DBName=__databaseName__ -v DBSchema=__EAVFW__ -v SystemAdminSecurityGroupId=1b714972-8d0a-4feb-b166-08d93c6ae328 -v UserGuid=__userGuid__ -v UserName="__userName__" -v UserEmail=__userEmail__ -v UserPrincipalName=__userPrincipalName__
scripts.db-setup: npm run db-docker && npm run db-generate-init-scripts
scripts.db-apply-setup: npm run db-initialize && npm run db-run-script
scripts.db-create: npm run gm && npm run db-setup && npm run db-apply-setup && npm run db-connection-string
